attributes.action: Doctors to return to face to face
attributes.additional_details: Doctors to return to day to day basis work not hide behind a phone how can u diagnose a lump or similar over a phone
attributes.background: Doctors need to return to normal work like others have , people are going to hospital more because of doctors lack of help and not seeing patients , they need to return to face to face like before covid

rejection.details: There are no Government restrictions that prevent doctors (such as GPs) or other healthcare professionals from holding face-to-face appointments. Decisions relating to doctors' appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS and individual healthcare providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
